subject: Rajasthan Geography
topic: Udyog aur Audyogik Vikas ke Kendra
question_en: Which city in Rajasthan is known as the 'Textile City'?
question_hi: राजस्थान में जिस शहर को 'टेक्सटाइल सिटी' के नाम से जाना जाता है, वह है?
explanation_en: Jodhpur is known as the 'Textile City' due to its rich textile industry.
explanation_hi: जोधपुर को 'टेक्सटाइल सिटी' के नाम से जाना जाता है क्योंकि यहां की विशाल कपड़ा उद्योग है।

subject: Rajasthan Geography
topic: Udyog aur Audyogik Vikas ke Kendra
question_en: Which city in Rajasthan is known as the 'Marble City'?

explanation_en: Kishangarh is known as the 'Marble City' due to its rich marble industry.
